title: HELP  Serious FPS issues
body: Normally my FPS is stable and i keep it capped at 60, but recently i cant go a few minutes without the FPS dropping to about 2 rendering the game unplayable for a good 20-30 seconds making it impossible to do anything, my concern is that its not constant frame lag. it spikes. and ive got no idea whats causing it. SOMEONE PLEASE HELP, any suggestions appreciated

replies.body:
Do you experience FPS problems in any other semi-intensive games?

Does this happen all the time or only occasionally?

Have you experienced this in the past or is this only a recent issue? Have you made any recent hardware/software alterations that may be causing this?

Could you follow the steps on the [FPS Troubleshooting Guide here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-troubleshooting#section-windows) and let me know if anything works?

thanks for the reply, i've completed the troubleshooting. i played a game and my fps still starts off stable and a few minutes in drops for apparently no reason at all

i've got all the settings on low, sound off and nothing running in the background. but still no change

While you're playing and the fps starts dropping, open up your task manager and see if all your memory is getting used up by LoL or another program (a memory leak can eat up all your resources and bring your pc to a grinding halt).
